items.sentence: You're always complaining about your husband.
You're bound to fail unless you study harder.
You should pay more attention to your health.
You may stay at my house as long as you like.
You must not allow the children to play here.
You may as well know the truth of the matter.
You should try to figure it out for yourself.
You never know when this might come in handy.
You must apologize to Tom, and do it at once.
Could you tell me how to get to the bus stop?
Yesterday, I read a really interesting story.
The administration makes important decisions.
I shouldn't have called Tom so late at night.
Do you and Tom usually communicate in French?
Why do you think Tom is reluctant to do that?
If you want me to help you do that, just ask.
Things will get worse before they get better.
I didn't know it would be so hard to do that.
I didn't know Tom wouldn't help Mary do that.
I didn't know Tom wouldn't do that yesterday.
I didn't know Tom would permit me to do that.
I didn't know Tom would be afraid to do that.
I didn't know Tom wasn't planning to do that.
I didn't know Tom was planning on doing that.
I didn't know Tom was going to do that today.
I didn't know Tom knew why he should do that.
I didn't know Tom knew who wanted to do that.
I didn't know Tom knew who needed to do that.
I didn't know Tom knew who did that for Mary.
I didn't know Tom didn't know how to do that.
You don't need to do anything else right now.
How much time will it really take to do that?
It doesn't matter what you say. I wonâ€²t stay.

I have no intention of going there by myself.
Please don't mention that Tom has been fired.
Tom was the only one who volunteered to help.
Tom managed to get hold of Mary on the phone.
I don't know how much money Tom will lend me.
I don't know how much money Tom will give me.
I didn't want to tell Tom about the accident.
I didn't want Tom to think he had to help me.
I didn't want Tom to go to Boston without me.
I didn't know anything about Tom at the time.
Tom asked Mary to buy him something to drink.
Tom and Mary went out to watch the fireworks.
Tom and Mary moved to Boston three years ago.
Tom and Mary got married and moved to Boston.
Tom and Mary don't live in this neighborhood.
